name: Mobile Suit Gundam Double Zeta Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Judau Ashta.

	Judau Ashta is a powerful Newtype who works at a junkyard in Side One. Beecha Oleg and Mondo Agake are friends of his, and Uso Evin is from "Victory Gundam".

questions.text: Who hosts the quiz show in the first episode?
questions.explanation:
Char Aznable.

	The first episode of the series was a clip show recapping the events of "Mobile Suit Gundam" and "Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam". The quiz show covers the mobile suits used, and the contestant who wins gets a free trip to Jupiter.

questions.text: Who is in the escape pod?
questions.explanation:
Yazan Gable.

	Gable was a mobile suit pilot who was particularly unscrupulous when it came to combat. He survives the events of "Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam" only to be killed before the tenth episode of "Mobile Suit Gundam Double Zeta".

A pig.

	The first half of "Mobile Suit Gundam Double Zeta" is comedic, contrasting the somber ending of "Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam". Yazan is just one of the surviving characters to be reduced to moronic antics in the show.

Mashymre Cello.

	Cello is a dangerous and vicious officer of Haman Karn's Neo-Zeon movement. An artificial Newtype, he is mentally unstable, which seems to be a staple characteristic of all artificial Newtypes.

questions.text: What is the first mobile suit Mashymre takes into combat?
questions.explanation:
Gallus-J.

	Neo-Zeon leader Haman Karn claimed that Cello was one of the best pilots in the Neo-Zeon movement, and gave him a rose which Cello keeps close at all times.

questions.text: How does Bright hide the Argama from the Neo-Zeon forces?
questions.explanation:
Hides it in trash.

	In the early episodes, Judau repeatedly boards the Argama and steals the Zeta Gundam for his own personal use or to sell it in return for much-needed cash.

questions.text: Which pilot listed primarily uses the Hamma Hamma?
questions.explanation:
Mashymre Cello.

	The Hamma Hamma is a formidable mobile suit used by Haman Karn's Neo-Zeon forces. It's main weapons were not mounted on the suit, but rather the suit's shield.

questions.text: Whom does Haman send to keep an eye on Mashymre?
questions.explanation:
Chara Soon.

	Chara is another crack pilot for the Neo Zeon movement, but she doesn't survive the series. Fa is the lover and caretaker of Kamille Bidan, and both Reccoa Londe and Emma Sheen died in "Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam".

questions.text: The Double Zeta Gundam makes its first appearance in the eleventh episode of the series.
questions.explanation:
True.

	A recurring theme in Gundam shows is that the main character will recieve a more powerful mobile suit about halfway into the series, such as Kamille Bidan getting the Zeta Gundam. However, the Double Zeta Gundam shows up earlier than halfway.
